featured.text: So in many parts of the world dolphins and fishermen are in __32__ for tuna.
In the past, there wasn’t much conflict __33__ dolphins and fishermen, because the numbers of tuna in the ocean were enormous.

definition.zh_def: 捕魚者，專門從事捕撈魚類的人。
definition.en_def: A person who catches fish for a living or as a hobby.
definition.example: The fisherman cast his net into the sea at dawn.
